text: 13.11 Kis 29.14, Wkp 6.30, 16.27, Nam 19.3 Bɨ God nop sɨbogep bɨawl yɨbɨl ak, chag sipsip chag bulmakaw tap okok pakɨl nɨkɨm dɨl, God nop sɨbogɨnɨg, God kal ñɨluk mɨgan ayaŋ suŋtep ke yɨbɨl mɨgan ak amub. Anɨgek, God ne binɨb tap si tap tɨmel gɨpal okok tɨg walɨg gɨyokup. Nonɨm okok pen damɨl, mɨdebal seŋayaŋ dagɨlek pɨsnep yɨn sɨbok amub.
